page.original:
&ltTBL>.UNMARK() Syntax &ltTBL>.UNMARK() Description The &ltTBL>.UNMARK() method unmarks the current record. Note : To unmark all records use <TBL>.UNMARK_RANGE(). Example dim tb as P tb = table.open("customer") tb.fetch_first() tb.change_begin(.t.) tb.mark() ? tb.is_marked() = .T. tb.unmark() ? tb.is_marked() = .F.
See Also Table Functions and Methods
